description.narrative: In the project area humanitarian actors were working separately and they were not aware of each other#s program and agenda, this project has helped to minimize the distance among different stakeholders and provided a platform to work in a coordinate way under theoverall supervision of DDMA. This is just an initiation and hopefully at the end of project NVCCDF will be able to bring all stakeholders under one umbrella. The proposed project activities enhance the skills and awareness level of targeted beneficiaries in humanitarian sector. These intervention enabled the local community to respond any emergency situation more organized and quickly as before As discussed there was no organized humanitarian network especially at community level in the proposed project area and humanitarian services were carried out if any in an ill organized way. This project is gradually moving forward to bridge the gap that will prove fruitful humanitarian services in future. Like communities it required to work on humanitarian capacity building of government department and NGOs working in the area. Likewise community empowerment, establishing and strengthen working relationship between different stakeholders is key area that required. Proposed project is gradually but steadily working to improve this area and will hope at the end of this project we may able to convert this vulnerability in to our strength. # To enhance the capacity of the humanitarian organizations, NVCCDF Staff and LSOs active volunteers in District Neelum for effective and efficient emergency response # Humanitarian Network Establishment at District Level # Enhance knowledge of humanitarian services in local communities # Developing Strategic plan for the organization

participating-org.narrative: Neelum Valley Cluster Coordination Development Forum (NVCCDF) is a nonprofit and non-governmental organization, having net work of 750 male and female community organization (COs) at grass root level working for the wellbeing of poor and disadvantaged segments ofthe society. It was established in 2003 and is registered under society#s act of 1860. The establishment of the organization was deeply felt due to continuum of neglect and miseries that people of Neelum valley had been facing since decades. The very purpose of the organization was to address the overarching issues of poverty, human rights violation, Gender discrimination, Disasters, climatechange and conflict across the Line of Control having negative effects on masses in AJK. While serving the poor and grassroots communities, NVCCDF started its activities in 2003 on mutual help basis from rural remote area called Athmuqam of AJK and gradually expanded its services to other districts such as Muzaffarabad and Hattian. Together with poverty alleviation work in the areas, NVCCDF remained actively involved in pursuing its mission of bringing about change in the status quo environment of political exploitation, gender-discrimination and violation of human rights at various levels.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to life and security

description.narrative: no. of local organisations that have the capacity to provide quality humanitarian response according to international standards (sphere and code of conduct) when necessary and has improved its accountability towards the local people
